lines.text: Even in the smallest rooms, you gotta play it big. I learned that 'cause I lived it, baby.

[after the CD store clerk says she has no "Eddie Player" CDs]
Man-o-man-shevitz! What ever happened to vinyl?

[after the CD store clerk says she has no "Eddie Player" CDs]
Man-o-man-o-shevitz! What ever happened to vinyl?
